segments.text: Don't worry . I'm sure you'll do better next time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't realize it was so difficult though I know I'm always too nervous in such competition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think I performed well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! That's much hetter than I did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me how to improve myself ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's no secret at all . The only thing for you to do is to practice more . You will succeed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a pleasure . Come on . I'm on your side .
segments.speaker: S1
